page.title: 05SKREENS PARK FARM,ROXWELL
page.content: {Skreens Park Farm}is a little way up from Cooley Spring. It is an arable and an animal farm. The Farmer has five friesians and one aquitaine. He usually has about 50 cows per year , fattens them up and sends them to a slaughter house to be killed and used for beef. Inside a small room there were 206{turkey chicks}being fattened} for Christmas Dinners. There was a wooden surround with sawdust on the floor and containers of pellets and water. There were electric bulbs above a dome shape for heat and light. Outside we saw a sort of cage known as a cattle crush, used for restraining the cows whilst giving them injections and ear tags. Crops grown : 92 acres wheat, 23 acres rape, 15 acres potatoes, 10 acres Spring Beans.
